statements: DELETE FROM energy_efficiency_tracking WHERE process_id = 100 AND energy_saved > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM energy_efficiency_tracking WHERE cost_savings < 2000.00 AND process_name = 'Production Line A';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE source_id = (SELECT id FROM energy_sources WHERE source_name = 'Solar Power') AND consumption_date = '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM ProcessImprovements WHERE plant_id = 1 AND process_id = 100;
DELETE FROM EnergySavings WHERE month = '2022-01-01' AND source = 'Renewable Energy';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE plant_id = 1 AND month = '2022-01-01';
